title: Pick one champion to defend you the rest will try to kill you
body:
Choose wisely :)

Note: Your champion is allowed to bring a maximum of three items
Example being = {{champion:80}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3026}} 
every other champion will be going in w/o items

replies.body:
{{champion:203}} 
Ha I will never die{{item:3634}} {{item:3599}} {{item:3902}}
{{champion:136}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3020}} BOOP

{{champion:420}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3110}}

https://a2ua.com/kraken/kraken-004.jpg

Enough.
{{champion:82}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3078}} bring it on scrubs. I've got a dragon.

Spirit visage, dead man's plate, and Titanic hydra.

And about 5000 stacks, hes still gonna farm afterwards
"I must be stronger"

{{champion:82}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3026}} 
we will both synergize with each other and we'll heal off of enemy champions
{{champion:17}}, while they are busy killing him, I will make my escape :D

{{champion:21}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3071}} 

Bring it on.

{{champion:3}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3075}} 
At this point, he's practically unkillable.

Sivir with greaves infinity edge and bloodthurster.

W procs all day.

Karthus with 3 rabadons
Or pantheon with 3 rabadons and try to bait them to stand in the circle.

{{champion:133}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}}  
Run, split, and make picks

{{champion:17}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3089}}
